column1: Managing Organisational Risk and Resilience MSc
column5: Our MSc in Managing Organisational Risk and Resilience has been designed to enhance the knowledge and capability of experienced professionals who are seeking to develop advanced capability to meet the needs of evolving organisations, through a rigorous and applied programme of study.Led by our experienced and supportive academic team, the programme involves the study of both civil protection and business continuity, as well as the challenges and opportunities with threat and risk management.This programme is eligible for funding under the UK Ministry of Defence Enhanced Learning Credits (ELC) scheme – our ELCAS number is 1682
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
